verses.verse: Righteous <S%H6662><s%> art Thou, O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> that I would plead <S%H7378><s%> [my] case <S%H7378><s%> with Thee; Indeed <S%H389><s%> I would discuss <S%H1696><s%> matters <S%H4941><s%> of justice <S%H4941><s%> with Thee: Why <S%H4069><s%> has the way <S%H1870><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> prospered <S%H6743><s%>? [Why] are all <S%H3605><s%> those who deal <S%H898><s%> in treachery <S%H9045><s%> at ease <S%H7951><s%>?

Thou hast planted <S%H5193><s%> them, they have also <S%H1571><s%> taken <S%H8327><s%> root; <S%H8327><s%> They grow, <S%H1980><s%> they have even <S%H1571><s%> produced <S%H6213><s%> fruit. <S%H6529><s%> Thou art near <S%H7138><s%> to their lips <S%H6310><s%> But far <S%H7350><s%> from their mind. <S%H3629><s%>

But Thou knowest <S%H3045><s%> me, O Lord; <S%H3068><s%> Thou seest <S%H7200><s%> me; And Thou dost examine <S%H974><s%> my heart's [attitude] toward <S%H854><s%> Thee. Drag <S%H5423><s%> them off <S%H5423><s%> like sheep <S%H6629><s%> for the slaughter <S%H2878><s%> And set <S%H6942><s%> them apart <S%H6942><s%> for a day <S%H3117><s%> of carnage! <S%H2028><s%>

How <S%H4970><s%> long <S%H5704><s%> <S%H4970><s%> is the land <S%H776><s%> to mourn <S%H56><s%> And the vegetation <S%H6212><s%> of the countryside <S%H3605><s%> <S%H7704><s%> to wither <S%H3001><s%>? For the wickedness <S%H9567><s%> of those who dwell <S%H3427><s%> in it, Animals <S%H929><s%> and birds <S%H5775><s%> have been snatched <S%H5595><s%> away, <S%H5595><s%> Because <S%H3588><s%> [men] have said, <S%H559><s%> "He will not see <S%H7200><s%> our latter <S%H319><s%> ending. <S%H319><s%>"

"If <S%H3588><s%> you have run <S%H7323><s%> with footmen <S%H7273><s%> and they have tired <S%H3811><s%> you out, Then how <S%H349><s%> can you compete <S%H2734><s%> with horses <S%H5483><s%>? If you fall <S%H982><s%> down <S%H982><s%> in a land <S%H776><s%> of peace, <S%H7965><s%> How <S%H349><s%> will you do <S%H6213><s%> in the thicket <S%H1347><s%> of the Jordan <S%H3383><s%>?

"For even <S%H1571><s%> your brothers <S%H251><s%> and the household <S%H1004><s%> of your father, Even <S%H1><s%> they have dealt <S%H1571><s%> treacherously <S%H898><s%> with you, Even <S%H898><s%> they have cried <S%H1571><s%> aloud <S%H7121><s%> after <S%H4392><s%> you. Do not believe <S%H310><s%> them, although <S%H539><s%> they may say <S%H3588><s%> nice <S%H1696><s%> things <S%H9186><s%> to you."

"I have forsaken <S%H5800><s%> My house, <S%H1004><s%> I have abandoned <S%H5203><s%> My inheritance; <S%H5159><s%> I have given <S%H5414><s%> the beloved <S%H3033><s%> of My soul <S%H5315><s%> Into the hand <S%H3709><s%> of her enemies. <S%H340><s%>

"My inheritance <S%H5159><s%> has become <S%H1961><s%> to Me Like a lion <S%H9030><s%> in the forest; <S%H9194><s%> She has roared <S%H5414><s%> <S%H6963><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> Me; Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> I have come to hate <S%H8130><s%> her.

"Is My inheritance <S%H5159><s%> like a speckled <S%H6641><s%> bird <S%H5861><s%> of prey <S%H5861><s%> to Me? Are the birds <S%H5861><s%> of prey <S%H5861><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> her on every <S%H5439><s%> side <S%H5439><s%>? Go, <S%H1980><s%> gather <S%H622><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the beasts <S%H9130><s%> of the field, <S%H7704><s%> Bring <S%H857><s%> them to devour! <S%H398><s%>

"Many <S%H7227><s%> shepherds <S%H7462><s%> have ruined <S%H7843><s%> My vineyard, <S%H3754><s%> They have trampled <S%H947><s%> down <S%H947><s%> My field; <S%H2513><s%> They have made <S%H5414><s%> My pleasant <S%H2532><s%> field <S%H2513><s%> A desolate <S%H8077><s%> wilderness. <S%H4057><s%>

"It has been made <S%H7760><s%> a desolation, <S%H8077><s%> Desolate, <S%H8076><s%> it mourns <S%H56><s%> before <S%H5921><s%> Me; The whole <S%H3605><s%> land <S%H776><s%> has been made <S%H8074><s%> desolate, <S%H8074><s%> Because <S%H3588><s%> no <S%H369><s%> man <S%H376><s%> lays <S%H7760><s%> it to heart. <S%H3820><s%>

"On all <S%H3605><s%> the bare <S%H8205><s%> heights <S%H8205><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> Destroyers <S%H7703><s%> have come, <S%H935><s%> For a sword <S%H2719><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is devouring <S%H398><s%> From one end <S%H7097><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> even to the other <S%H7097><s%>; <S%H776><s%> There <S%H369><s%> is no <S%H369><s%> peace <S%H7965><s%> for anyone. <S%H3605><s%> <S%H1320><s%>

"They have sown <S%H2232><s%> wheat <S%H2406><s%> and have reaped <S%H7114><s%> thorns, <S%H6975><s%> They have strained <S%H2470><s%> themselves to no <S%H3808><s%> profit. <S%H3276><s%> But be ashamed <S%H954><s%> of your harvest <S%H8393><s%> Because <S%H4480><s%> of the fierce <S%H2740><s%> anger <S%H639><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>"

Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> concerning <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> My wicked <S%H7451><s%> neighbors <S%H7934><s%> who strike <S%H5060><s%> at the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> with which <S%H834><s%> I have endowed <S%H5157><s%> My people <S%H5971><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> "Behold <S%H2009><s%> I am about to uproot <S%H5428><s%> them from their land <S%H127><s%> and will uproot <S%H5428><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> from among <S%H8432><s%> them.

"And it will come <S%H1961><s%> about that after <S%H310><s%> I have uprooted <S%H5428><s%> them, I will again <S%H7725><s%> have <S%H7355><s%> compassion <S%H7355><s%> on them; and I will bring <S%H7725><s%> them back, <S%H7725><s%> each <S%H376><s%> one <S%H376><s%> to his inheritance <S%H5159><s%> and each <S%H376><s%> one <S%H376><s%> to his land. <S%H776><s%>

"Then it will come <S%H1961><s%> about that if <S%H518><s%> they will really <S%H3925><s%> learn <S%H3925><s%> the ways <S%H1870><s%> of My people, <S%H5971><s%> to swear <S%H7650><s%> by My name, <S%H8034><s%> 'As the Lord <S%H3068><s%> lives, <S%H2416><s%>' even <S%H9201><s%> as they taught <S%H3925><s%> My people <S%H5971><s%> to swear <S%H7650><s%> by Baal, <S%H1168><s%> then they will be built <S%H1129><s%> up in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of My people. <S%H5971><s%>
"But if <S%H518><s%> they will not listen, <S%H8085><s%> then I will uproot <S%H5428><s%> that nation, <S%H1471><s%> uproot <S%H5428><s%> and destroy it," declares <S%H6><s%> the Lord. <S%H5002><s%>
